name: TCC Sogeti Green X Jam project
name_original: TCC Sogeti Green X Jam project
description:
Lore

are you feeling... a bit lost?
hey don't worry, we all feel list every now and then
it's completely, no judgement
have you tried reading through the #orga-tools_💪🛠✨  Discord salon?

it's great!
it cured my baldness,
made my lover get back with me,
and filed my taxes for me!
it's pretty great! try it, today!

no but in all seriousness tho
should be in there, m8 ;-)

I'm gonna miss that lorem ipsum when we replace it by an actual game presentation :'(...

How to play?
  • Keyboard
    • zqsd to wasd to Move
    • Space to Jumb
    • Enter to Repair
    • Esc to Pause game
      |
  • Controller
    • Right stick to Move
    • B to Jump
    • A to Repair
    • Start to Pause the game
Credits

    Project Manager, Game Designer, Sound Designer

Special thanks to Mahjoub for providing us with your Unity template, your git guide, and for being a great guy ❤️😀✨

Made with Unity 2022.1.3
